review: I love my Amazon Fire TV.  The installation was so easy and connecting to the Internet happened with almost no effort on my part.  However, there is a caveat:  even though I am a Prime member, many of the videos that I tried to watch cost additional fees.  It would be helpful if prime members had an even greater library of free movies and TV shows.  I want to binge watch Rizzoli and Isles yet I would have to pay.  That is not good.Other than that, I'm happy.
